heading: Notice to mortgagees and lienors
text:
Notwithstanding the foregoing provisions, no such judgment shall be entered
   and enforced as a tax lien against any property unless at the time of the issuance of the notice of violation a copy of such notice
   was also served on all mortgagees and lienors of record of such property by mail addressed to the recorded addresses of such
   mortgagees and lienors.
